name: Gun Fight! (Makto)
description:
GUN FIGHT!

Is a game inspired by Tomohiro Nishikado's game from 1975.

Pick either a revolver or a shotgun and see who is the best cowboy in this digital yellow west!

Controls:

Movement:

  • Player 1 :  W A S D
  • Player 2: UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT 

Shooting:

  • Shoot Up
    • Player 1: J
    • Player 2: 1
  • Shoot Straight
    • Player 1: K
    • Player 2: 2
  • Shoot Down
    • Player 1: L
    • Player 2: 3

Turn music off : M

Credits:

Backgrounds by Bxan at artbxan.itch.io/

Fastest Gun in the 8-bit West by OkamiDeluxe at youtube.com

Funeral March(8-bit) by jkfite01 at OpenGameArt.org

hitSFXs by LittleRobotSoundFactory at freeSound.org

Inspired by Gun Fight(1975) by Tomohiro Nishikado.

Made with Raylib by Ray at raylib.com

Art made with Piskel at piskelapp.com.

Programmed by Juan Cruz Tourret.
